CSS

Responsive differs from other CSS frameworks in that it is built specifically not to force opinionated design on the developer. Instead we've jam-packed it with useful functionality to allow you to build a truly cross-browser responsive experience: Grids, forms, buttons, and other elements have been normalized and enhanced to iron out bugs and make it simple for you to create your award winning site.

Check out the details in each section.

﻿

Responsive is a responsive web development boilerplate built for your benefit by @james_m_south

Excerpts of this code are based on the incredibly hard work by the good people responsible for Normalize.css, HTML5 Boilerplate, Twitter Bootstrap, and Zurb Foundation.

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
